full_threads.body:
Hi Heath
The PDF is good and the can add the wine of choice


Kind Regards
Rosanna


> On 6 Aug 2021, at 8:12 pm, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com> wrote:
>
> ﻿ Hi Rosanna,
>
> We have updated so that the customer receives a confirmation as well.
>
> Regarding the wine list, there as many items, it would not be a good idea to have them all coded on the page like that. Could we perhaps attach the PDF and give them a free text field to type in which wine they would like? Or maybe have a check box that says ‘I would like to order wine’ so that when you call for payment info you know to ask them?
> Heath Maguire
> DIRECTOR
>
> Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300 072 134>
> Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415 162 271>
> Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>
>
> <https://wpperk.com/>
>
